name: Set Transform

inputs.name: Enter
inputs.description: The input execution that triggers this node

inputs.name: Self
inputs.description: The Transform to be set with position, rotation, and scale

inputs.name: Is Local
inputs.description: A boolean value that determines which type of space to be set. Check it to set the Transform as local, otherwise, world.

description: Set the position, rotation, and scale of an input Transform with the ability to toggle between local and world spaces.
